import React from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import quotes from '../images/quotes.png'; function About() { const lightblue = '#89BEAF'; const Title = styled.h1` font-size: 1.5em; text-align: center; color: palevioletred; `; return (
About Me

Hi there! My name is Ruth but I prefer Alanna. I’m a passionate introvert who loves immersing in the world of code.

I currently work as a developer at Travelopia, where I work to improve the experience of building and deploying to the modern web. I spend a lot of time reading to increase my knowledge and writing to share what I've learned or currently learning in tech as well as stories about how he used to suck, listened to people who taught him valuable lessons, and made changes that helped him suck less.

Years later, I decided to try learning Python. It was a radically different experience. I distinctly remember the moment it clicked; I was watching The Price is Right, and they were spinning the big wheel. A contestant landed on 0.70, and it made me wonder: statistically, what was their best move?

Since then, I’ve been honing my skills and learning the backend. I am currently going through Lambda School's 18-month intensive Fullstack Development program. I’m seeking a full-time role where I can play a part in helping others achieve their goals.

Resume
); } export default About;
